text: ahasda, bhumiyada, ohuge niyogayata anuva sthirava tibimada, ohuge sadhakayangen æti dæyayi. (obata niyama karanu læbu kalaya dakva oba ehi jivat vi maranayata pat vu pasu bhumiyehi bhumadanaya karanu læbimen) pasuda ohu obava kændavuvahot ekama eka sabdayakin evelema oba bhumiyen ikut vanu labannehuya
